snippet.title: V-VR - The Weirdest Job Simulator - Humanity Is Obsolete - Virtual Virtual Reality (Oculus Rift VR)
snippet.description:
Today we're checking out Virtual Virtual Reality. V-VR is a narrative-driven comedy-adventure game about VR and AI. In a future where AI has transformed society, can humans still find purpose? Find out with Activitude, a service that lets humans aid AI clients in increasingly curious ways. Follow the instructions of Activitude’s AI overlord, Chaz, and find your calling in this tech-fueled future – or try to break free and reclaim your humanity before it’s too late. Use virtual VR headsets to explore over 50 unique virtual virtual realities, going deeper into the inner workings of Activitude as the story unfolds.

I hope you enjoyed this episode of V-VR, thanks so much for watching and liking.

Discord: https://discord.gg/draegast

Twitter: https://goo.gl/n6j81c

My Webpage: https://www.draegast.com/

Intro/Outtro Music By Oddchap: https://goo.gl/5QSsAU

#Drae #vr #VirtualReality
